data.message: The enlarged deal is way too much for me. Anyway to switch it back?

replies.message: FB Purity. Google it and install it.
wish they would leave things alone
I agree i don't like it.
Sorry guys i didn't think my coment went in sorry

I don't like the new look either!  To many things running down the right side of the screen, trendinga apps, ect...especially on "my"  timeline, takes away from my pics,ect.  How can we tell FB we liked it the way it was!  Well, I just did...I sure hope they listen.  I don't know about others, but I'm thinking of looking for another social network, other than FB.  Myspace started changing and I came to FB...now they are changing more than Myspace ever did!
kind of like it because its bigger and easier to read have to get use to it though
Well,after a few hour it's not so bad,still annoying.
We could already enlarge our pages using the computer. We did not need this change from fb, or any of the others, now that I think about it.
Is there another social network out there. I bet if they FB us all they would do what we want! They would be begging us to come back.
why we can't see the pictures to the left anymore?? of who's on line what happen??? u make changes and then u asked hope u like it. do we have a choice.
yes please switch it bac    y should ask first   u dont have to fool with your changes  we do!
